description.h2: The xlink:role attribute of an element with a type='extended' attribute or a type='resource' attribute must be present and must not be empty.
description.p: REMARK: Note that type='extended' is handled by XBRL 2.1 so this really only applies to type='resource', and there are other rules for reference and footnote that would trigger errors if the xlink:role were missing. Therefore just one variation for the label resource, for now. Also note that this only applies to a company extension linkbase.

variation.name: 6.9.4, A label resource with no xlink:role attribute, NOGOOD.
variation.description: A label resource with no xlink:role attribute, NOGOOD.
